---
title: "Publications"
---

My research spans population, evolutionary, and landscape ecology, ecohydrology, and conservation biology. Here's a list of peer-reviewed publications describing this work. You can also follow my work on [Google Scholar](https://scholar-google-com.usgslibrary.idm.oclc.org/citations?user=CRU3WVMAAAAJ&hl=en) and [ResearchGate](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Jeff-Baldock). If you encounter a paywall, please email me and I will be happy to send you a copy of the paper.
